title: High-speed video captures how cannibalistic mosquito larvae snag their prey
description: Two species launch their heads like a harpoon; a third relies on tail sweeps.

title: YouTube’s new Primetime Channels puts 34 streaming services in one place
description: You can subscribe to and watch streaming services, like Showtime, on YouTube.

title: Meta’s AI-powered audio codec promises 10x compression over MP3
description: Technique could allow high-quality calls and music on low-quality connections.

title: The close-up view of two Falcon rockets landing is as majestic as you think
description: This was the first time SpaceX invited photographers to set Florida landing zone remotes.

title: Musk calls Twitter verification system “bullsh—,” announces $8 monthly charge
description: Musk slams "Twitter's current lords & peasants system" for verifying users.

title: Pantone wants $15/month for the privilege of using its colors in Photoshop
description: Changes have already hit some users, but communication and timing are muddled.

title: OpenSSL 3 patch, once Heartbleed-level “critical,” arrives as a lesser “high”
description: It's tricky to exploit, and on a less-popular version, but needs patching ASAP.

title: Charter raises base Internet to $80 a month; price hikes to hit 9.5M users
description: Charter price hikes boost Spectrum Internet tiers to $80, $100, and $120.

title: Twitter restricts staff from policing content violations ahead of US midterms
description: Instead of hundreds of employees enforcing violations, there are now about 15.

title: Sound Burger portable record player returns from the ’80s with Bluetooth, USB-C
description: Audio-Technica brings back a cult classic to cash in on vinyl's second act.

title: NASCAR driver stuns racing world with a move learned from Nintendo GameCube
description: Ross Chastain sets lap record and qualifies for championship thanks to NASCAR 2005.

title: Sorry, prey. Black widows have surprisingly good memory
description: Despite their tiny brains, spiders show some complex cognitive calculations.

title: SpaceX successfully launches its first Falcon Heavy in 40 months
description: SpaceX now has one more landing—51—than launches this year.

title: RIP Google Hangouts, Google’s last, best chance to compete with iMessage
description: Today Google realizes it needs to fight iMessage, but it's 8 years too late.

title: Interventions that reduce partisan vitriol don’t help democracy
description: Thinking better of your partisan opponents doesn't mean you want them voting.
